Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 060259 ZMQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 31.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 060210 ZMM pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060211 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to facilitate the development of an attended public parking garage.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 060259 ZMQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 31.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
